abilities.title: Photosynthetic Illumination
abilities.description: The Lumiflora can emit a bright, bioluminescent light through photosynthesis, capable of illuminating large areas.

abilities.title: Symbiotic Healing
abilities.description: It can heal injured plants and animals through a symbiotic energy transfer.

abilities.title: Camouflage
abilities.description: The Lumiflora can alter its color to blend seamlessly with its surroundings.

habitats.location: Deep within the Amazon Rainforest, near the Rio Negro

encounters.outcome: The tribe was guided through the rainforest at night by the Lumiflora's light.
The team observed the Lumiflora healing a diseased tree.
